name: Quebrith + Sol
effect: Negates all pain for 1 hour lessening penalties from criticals and being near death by 4.

name: Aether + Caelum
effect: Negates dim light penalties for an hour but doubles bright light penalties

name: Fulgur + Sol
effect: Puts you into a death like coma for 1 hour

name: Caelum + Hydragenum
effect: Allows you to stay awake all night with no penalties
